ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: Smokes 5 or More Cigarettes Per Day

ns0:Concept.displayName: Moderate smoker (20 or less per day) (finding)

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes or concepts that identify patients who smoke more than 5 cigarettes per day.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Assessment, Performed for "Assessment, Performed" for "Average Number of Cigarettes Smoked Per Day" as an attribute of result. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are smoke more than 5 cigarettes per day.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT codes identifying patients who smoke more than 5 cigarettes per day.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to patients who smoke 5 or less cigarettes per day.)
